headline.main: ENCOURAGEMENT CALLED DIET AID; Group Discussion Is Found Effective in Reducing

docs.abstract: 2 studies of overweight people trying to lose weight, made at Fort Dix, NJ, and Indiana U, show group discussion among dieters most effective aid, more effective than drugs or elec shocks; details
docs.lead_paragraph: Encouraging words--from either a fellow-sufferer or a third party--are the best help for a fat person trying to lose weight, according to two studies made public this week.
docs.snippet: Encouraging words--from either a fellow-sufferer or a third party--are the best help for a fat person trying to lose weight, according to two studies made public this week.
